title: Change it up with Chroma Packs

replies.body: All right. So personally I think these should be free. But not just any free thing. I think it could be integrated really well win the new champion levelling system. I think this would be very cool and could add something different to league. Thank you! , Max
^^^ This is an awesome idea! ^^^
It's a rip off the hero's of the storm skin changes
And every MOBA could be considered a rip off of DotA, but that's getting into unnecessary details. Just because one game does something doesn't mean other games can't do the same thing.
And Dota is a lazy ripoff of a warcraft mod. >.>
The warcraft mod is what I was referring to.
"The warcraft mod is what I was referring to.", i logged in just to upvote this comment
well LOL dev was the one who created dota allstar in warcraft. what are u on about?
Heroes of the storm is a rip off of LoL anyway Moddude, so m8, plz just shut it.

Yeah and LoL ripped off Dota. I think Valve should be sued for making Dota 2 as well because its a copy of dota 1. I think the whole MOBA industry should be sued because every single MOBA game is the same as the other since our main goal is to destroy the enemy base.


Nobody gives a crap. ._.

Riot stop thinking about tryna make more money and listen to this man!
there is no proper basis to the current leveling system...you give people a number and thats about it. no rewards no gain. if you were to implement different colour skins to certain ranks of a champ then it would be a side mission or a goal to try and achieve which would make people want to play league.

people already want to play league. But I do get your point. Personally it doesn't matter anymore, when almost everyone by now is level 30 anyways. Would there be something for people that are already level 30 too? Or do you mean other ranks, as in league ranks etc?

Great idea! It's like the system in infinite crisis, i reckon it'd be awesome if it was integrated into LoL like that :3
Otherwise, the chroma packs are a good idea, but I wouldn't spend RP on it.
For something that can be done in Gimp that takes 15 minutes, the price is a little too steep. I'm gonna have to pass on chromas.
would've been cooler if you could choose specific parts of the skin to recolour yourself with any colour that you want...
and like a 590 rp to unlock all colour customisation for that champion would be worth it.
Awesome idea. Personally I would even pay 975 possibly more to be able to unlock all the colour customisations for the champion.
That yellow {{champion:64}} is sick as!

Nah, man.
The black {{champion:64}} looks absolutely badass
i guess you're not a fan of Bruce Lee {{summoner:3}}
Nah nah nah, has to be the Blue {{champion:64}} all the way! XD

Hmm 590 RP seems a bit too steep for me. In my honest opinion there could be much more rewarding and interesting ways this could be integrated into League and Champions/Summoners profiles. Maybe a bit more thought is required on it from Riot and the community before it's a definite thing. Have fun :D
I think they should be bought with ip because some people cant afford skins and it unfair. Rp rip off all your doing is changing colour
why not make these rewards for champion mastery instead? would that not be a bigger incentive? like smite does.

I WOULD pay for Chroma if it unlocked chroma for the WHOLE champions skin set... but 590rp just for a colour balance? pfft, i can do that 5 seconds in photoshop.
Awesome idea, but too steep a price. {{item:3070}}
Anyone else think that the {{champion:105}} skin changes look like a Neopet?

Make Zed Chroma pack plz Riot
{{champion:238}} or one for Yasuo{{champion:157}}
Why not integrate this as an incentive to play well or play fairly? Furthermore, not having to pay? Or certain colours depict the players 'Honorable opponent' medal etc.
I thought it would come out with champion mastery, unlocks a chroma skin at three different stages of the mastery.
EVERYONE! ITS JUST FUCKING SKIN
But where is the {{champion:27}} chroma pack ???

Hey Rito, why put chroma packs on some champs' skins, and some champs not? Seriously what the hell, I would legit buy all the Jax packs, but I think Nemesis is a gay skin. Thankyou for alienating everyone who plays vanilla skin champs that aren't {{champion:236}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:105}}
Normal Magikarp has evolved  into "Shiny Magikarp"!!

I think we should do a thing where for how many games we play on a champion we get a champion master level. so if you play 200 games as 'leona', you get the chroma pack and so people can see that you are a master leona. just an idea

I appreciate the League of Legends team coming up with new ideas to keep everyone happy. But that fact you are already making hundreds of millions of dollars every year then proposing such a steep price for a novelty item kinda sucks. I am in no way cheap, I have at least one skin+ for each female champion but I just feel like colour variations that you can even fully customize yourself is a little money grabbing. Not to compare you with other MOBAS but Heroes of the Storm offer this exact feature but for free and is unlocked by champion leveling.. my brief thoughts anyway! Thanks Rito x
Here I had myself convinced that riot would make these packs unlockable at three different stages of champion mastery but I was wrong.
um yea for once riot can u stop worrying about making $$$$ and actually give us the joy of having something for free in League of Legends.

I Agree with Maibones, this should be a free thing and should be available. But i think there should be some colors and chroma packs which are purchasable for idk like 100 rp or so. That would be awesome and a great new experience for the players on the rift.
P.S    {{champion:236}} looks great in the picture above. Really cool!
so will this be the sorta situation where you release them in "Packs"

>Not being able to choose from a RGB editor
>Forced to buy for the price of a bundle even if you intend on only using one scheme

This simply could have been done better.

i need lucian!!!!! 312 RP :(
when is this going to release?

Fizz actually is Sanic

Give zed one? {{champion:238}} 
And buff vayne as well {{champion:67}}
For 590 RP do you get one colour? or is it all three variations? That Jax on the right looks nice I think. The rest isn't of much interest to me.

I like how people keep saying they're copying Heroes of the Storm... this is a gaming community where ideas are shared and integrated into other games, you cant own an idea, you can own the product of the idea but never the idea itself :P {{item:3751}}
